userStories.title: Secure Email and Password Login
userStories.story: As a user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can securely access my personal account and manage my personal information.

userStories.title: Social Media Account Login
userStories.story: As a user, I want to log in using my social media account (e.g., Facebook, Google) so that the login process is easy and speeds up access to the app.

userStories.title: Admin High-Security Login
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to log in with a higher level of security to access the admin panel so that I can manage the application to ensure its secure and efficient operation.

userStories.title: Stay Logged In Option
userStories.story: As a returning user, I want the option to remain logged in so that I can avoid the inconvenience of entering my credentials each time I use the app.

userStories.title: Password Reset Functionality
userStories.story: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account without significant delay.

userStories.title: Strong Password Prompt
userStories.story: As a user, I want to be prompted to create a strong password so that I can enhance the security of my account.

userStories.title: Change Password Option
userStories.story: As a user, I want to change my password from my account settings for security reasons so that I can maintain control over my account access.

userStories.title: Admin-Enforced Password Complexity
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to enforce password complexity requirements so that I can enhance account security and protect user data.

userStories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Setup
userStories.story: As a user, I want to set up multi-factor authentication so that I can add an extra layer of security to my account, reducing the risk of unauthorized access.

userStories.title: Admin-Mandated Multi-Factor Authentication
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to require multi-factor authentication for all users so that I can ensure higher security standards across the platform.

userStories.title: Account Verification via Email or Phone
userStories.story: As a new user, I want to verify my email address or phone number to activate my account so that I can confirm my identity to enable account functionality.

userStories.title: Admin-Required Account Verification
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to ensure that all accounts are verified so that I can maintain data integrity and trust in the user base.

userStories.title: Last Account Access Visibility
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see where and when my account was last accessed so that I can monitor for suspicious activities and protect my account from unauthorized use.

userStories.title: Log Out from All Devices
userStories.story: As a user, I want to be able to log out from all devices for security purposes so that I can ensure my account remains secure, even if a device is lost or compromised.

userStories.title: Admin Session Termination Capability
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to be able to terminate any active user sessions if a security breach is suspected so that I can quickly mitigate potential threats and protect user data.

userStories.title: Link/Unlink Social Media Accounts
userStories.story: As a user, I want to link or unlink my social media accounts with my app account for easier management so that I can streamline my login process and control which data is shared between platforms.

userStories.title: View Linked Social Media Accounts
userStories.story: As a user, I wish to see which social media accounts are linked to my app account so that I can easily manage my linked accounts and be aware of where my data is being shared.

userStories.title: Account Recovery Security Questions
userStories.story: As a user, I want to set up security questions to recover my account if I lose access so that I have an alternative method to regain control of my account in case I forget my login details.

userStories.title: Admin Authentication Method Control
userStories.story: As an admin, I need the option to enable or disable specific authentication methods based on security protocols so that I can ensure the highest level of security and adapt to changing security requirements.

userStories.title: Profile Information Update
userStories.story: As a user, I want to update my profile information (name, username) so that I can keep my account information current and relevant.

userStories.title: Profile Photo Upload/Change
userStories.story: As a user, I want to upload or change my profile photo so that I can personalize my account and make it more recognizable to others.

userStories.title: Preferred Name Specification
userStories.story: As a user, I want to specify a preferred name so that I am addressed in a way that I feel comfortable with, rather than being referred to by my legal name.

userStories.title: Contact Details Update
userStories.story: As a user, I want to add or update my contact details (email, phone number, address) so that I can ensure accurate communication and effective account recovery if needed.

userStories.title: Email Address Verification/Change
userStories.story: As a user, I wish to verify or change my email address so that I can ensure itâ€™s correct and my account is secure.

userStories.title: Shipping and Billing Address Management
userStories.story: As a user, I need to add or edit my shipping and billing address so that I can facilitate accurate and efficient order processing.

userStories.title: Account Privacy Settings Adjustment
userStories.story: As a user, I want to adjust my account privacy settings so that I can control who can see my profile and activity, maintaining my privacy as per my preference.

userStories.title: Communication Preferences Setting
userStories.story: As a user, I need to be able to set and change my communication preferences (like email or SMS notifications) so that I can receive updates in a way that suits me best.

userStories.title: Account Activity/History View
userStories.story: As a user, I want to view my account activity or history so that I can monitor my actions and interactions within the app, staying informed about my usage.

userStories.title: Account Data Download Option
userStories.story: As a user, I want to be able to download my account data so that I can have a personal backup for review and keep a record of my data.

userStories.title: Account Deactivation Option
userStories.story: As a user, I want to deactivate my account temporarily so that I can preserve my data for future use without permanently losing my account information.

userStories.title: Permanent Account Deletion
userStories.story: As a user, I want to permanently delete my account and all its associated data so that I can maintain my privacy and data security if I no longer wish to use the service.

userStories.title: Link/Unlink Additional Social Media Accounts
userStories.story: As a user, I want to link or unlink other social media accounts to my main account so that I can have easier access and integration across platforms.

userStories.title: Language Preference Setting
userStories.story: As a user, I wish to set up or change language preferences so that I can use the application in my preferred language, making it more accessible and personalized for me.

userStories.title: Push Notification Enable/Disable
userStories.story: As a user, I want to enable or disable push notifications so that I can control when I receive updates and maintain my desired level of engagement with the app.

userStories.title: Alert Type Preferences
userStories.story: As a user, I wish to set preferences for different types of alerts so that I can receive only communications that are relevant and important to me.

userStories.title: Notification Frequency Customization
userStories.story: As a user, I want to customize the frequency of notifications so that I can avoid being overwhelmed by too many alerts and maintain a balance in the notifications I receive.

userStories.title: Admin Default Notification Settings
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to set default notification settings for new users so that they are adequately informed without requiring initial setup, enhancing their first-time experience.

userStories.title: Important Account Activity Push Notifications
userStories.story: As a user, I want to receive push notifications about important account activity so that I can stay informed and responsive to changes or updates in my account status.

userStories.title: Personalized Offers Push Notifications
userStories.story: As a user, I want to receive push notifications for special offers and promotions tailored to my interests so that I don't miss out on deals that are relevant to me.

userStories.title: Security Alert Email Notifications
userStories.story: As a user, I want to receive email notifications for password changes or security alerts related to my account so that I can be immediately aware of and respond to potential security issues.

userStories.title: Marketing Email Opt-In/Out
userStories.story: As a user, I want to opt into or out of marketing emails from within my account settings so that I have control over the type of promotional content I receive.

userStories.title: Recent In-App Notifications List
userStories.story: As a user, I want to view a list of recent in-app notifications so that I can catch up on anything I missed and stay up-to-date with app activities.

userStories.title: App Icon Badge Notifications
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see badge notifications on the app icon so that I can be aware of unread notifications without needing to open the app.

userStories.title: Notification Channel Choices
userStories.story: As a user, I want to choose which channels (email, SMS, in-app) I receive notifications through so that I can get them in my preferred method, enhancing my user experience.

userStories.title: Admin Targeted User Group Notifications
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to send targeted notifications to specific user groups based on their behavior or preferences so that communications are more effective and personalized, increasing user engagement.

userStories.title: Keyword-Based Item Search
userStories.story: As a user, I want to search for specific items using keywords so that I can quickly and efficiently find exactly what I'm looking for.

userStories.title: Search Suggestions
userStories.story: As a user, I wish to receive search suggestions as I type so that I can find items faster and streamline my search experience.

userStories.title: Search Result Filters
userStories.story: As a user, I want to filter search results by various criteria (e.g., date, popularity, relevance) so that I can more easily find the specific item I need among a large set of options.

userStories.title: Saved Search Preferences
userStories.story: As a user, I want to save my search filters or preferences for future searches so that I can enjoy a customized search experience that remembers my preferences.

userStories.title: Admin Predefined Search Filters
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to set up predefined filters for search results based on common user needs so that I can enhance user experience and guide users to what they're most likely looking for.

userStories.title: Category/Subcategory Navigation
userStories.story: As a user, I want to easily navigate through categories and subcategories when browsing items so that I can explore the app's offerings without feeling lost or overwhelmed.

userStories.title: Recently Viewed Items Section
userStories.story: As a user, I want to have a 'recently viewed items' section so that I can quickly go back to items I've looked at before without having to remember or re-search them.

userStories.title: Personalized Recommendations
userStories.story: As a user, I would like to see personalized recommendations based on my search and browsing history so that I can discover new items that align with my interests and preferences.

userStories.title: Search and Browsing History Clearing
userStories.story: As a user, I want the option to clear my search and browsing history for privacy reasons so that I can maintain control over my personal data and its visibility.

userStories.title: Admin Search Trend Analysis
userStories.story: As an admin, I need tools to analyze search trends and user behavior so that I can continuously improve the search feature, making it more effective and user-friendly.

userStories.title: Secure Payment Method Addition
userStories.story: As a user, I want to securely add and save my payment methods (credit card, PayPal, etc.) so that I can facilitate quick and hassle-free transactions.

userStories.title: In-App Purchases with Preferred Payment
userStories.story: As a user, I need to make purchases within the app using my preferred payment method so that my shopping experience is convenient and tailored to my preferences.

userStories.title: Payment Confirmation Notification
userStories.story: As a user, I want to receive immediate confirmation after completing a payment so that I can be reassured that the transaction was successful.

userStories.title: Billing Information Update
userStories.story: As a user, I need to view and update my billing information (like billing address) so that my invoicing details are always accurate and up-to-date.

userStories.title: Payment History and Invoice Access
userStories.story: As a user, I want to access my payment history and download invoices so that I can keep track of my expenditures and maintain personal financial records.

userStories.title: Admin Billing Information Management
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to manage and update billing information for users in case of disputes or errors so that any financial discrepancies can be resolved efficiently.

userStories.title: Subscription Service with Auto-Renewal
userStories.story: As a user, I want to subscribe to services with an option for automatic renewal so that my access to the service is uninterrupted and convenient.

userStories.title: Subscription Terms and Conditions Information
userStories.story: As a user, I need clear information on subscription terms, renewal dates, and cancellation policies so that I can make informed decisions about my subscriptions.

userStories.title: Subscription Management Options
userStories.story: As a user, I want to be able to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel my subscription easily so that I have full control over the services I receive and my expenses.

userStories.title: Secure Payment Information Storage
userStories.story: As a user, I need assurance that my payment information is stored securely and handled confidentially so that my financial data is protected against fraud and misuse.

userStories.title: Admin Fraud Detection Measures
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to implement fraud detection measures to prevent unauthorized transactions so that the integrity of transactions is maintained and users' trust is upheld.

userStories.title: Account Suspicious Activity Alerts
userStories.story: As a user, I want to receive alerts for any suspicious activity on my account so that I can be immediately aware of and respond to potential security breaches.

userStories.title: Refund Request Process
userStories.story: As a user, I want a straightforward process to request refunds where applicable so that I can get my money back without unnecessary hassle in case of unsatisfactory service.

userStories.title: Admin Refund and Dispute Management
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to handle refund requests and disputes efficiently to maintain customer trust and ensure a positive reputation for the service.

userStories.title: Clear Checkout Process with Order Review
userStories.story: As a user, I want a simple and clear checkout process with the ability to review my order before finalizing so that I can make sure my order is correct and avoid mistakes.

userStories.title: Promo Code and Gift Card Usage
userStories.story: As a user, I want to use promo codes or gift cards at checkout so that I can take advantage of discounts and special offers.

userStories.title: Local Currency Pricing and International Payment
userStories.story: As a user, I want to see prices in my local currency and complete transactions with international payment methods so that I can easily understand and manage my expenses without currency conversion hassles.

userStories.title: Admin Compliance with International Tax and Currency
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to comply with international tax regulations and currency conversion for global transactions so that the business operates legally and efficiently in different markets.

userStories.title: Integration of Payment Gateways
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to integrate reliable and reputable payment gateways into the app for processing transactions so that users can trust the security and reliability of their transactions.

userStories.title: Seamless Payment System Integration
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to ensure seamless integration of the payment system with other parts of the application, like user accounts and order management, so that the overall system works efficiently and error-free.

userStories.title: User Role Assignment and Modification
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to assign and modify user roles so that I can control access to different parts of the application based on the user's responsibilities and needs.

userStories.title: Role-Based Access Controls
userStories.story: As a user, I want to have access controls based on my role so that I can interact only with the features and data relevant to my position.

userStories.title: Role-Specific Permission Settings
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to define permission settings for each role so that I can ensure users have appropriate access rights to protect sensitive information.

userStories.title: Role-Based Tailored Interface
userStories.story: As a user, I want to receive a tailored interface based on my role so that I can have a streamlined and relevant experience with the app.

userStories.title: Central Admin Panel for Role Management
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to easily manage role assignments in a central admin panel so that I can efficiently handle user access across the application.

userStories.title: User Access Level Understanding
userStories.story: As a user, I want to understand my access level and permissions so that I am aware of my capabilities and restrictions within the app.

userStories.title: Creation and Management of Role-Specific Permissions
userStories.story: As an admin, I need to create and manage roles with specific permissions so that I can accurately align app functionalities with user responsibilities.

userStories.title: Admin Role-Based Activity Audit
userStories.story: As an admin, I want to review and audit role-based activities so that I can ensure compliance with policies and detect any unauthorized or suspicious actions.

userStories.title: User Permission Request and Role Change
userStories.story: As a user, I want to request additional permissions or a role change so that I can access more features or functionalities as my responsibilities grow or change.
